titleStmt.title: Sparse Representation for Gaussian Process Models

affiliation.orgName: Neural Computing Research Group School of Engineering and Applied Sciences
Neural Computing Research Group School of Engineering and Applied Sciences

analytic.title: Sparse Representation for Gaussian Process Models

abstract.p: We develop an approach for a sparse representation for Gaussian Process (GP) models in order to overcome the limitations of GPs caused by large data sets. The method is based on a combination of a Bayesian online algorithm together with a sequential construction of a relevant subsample of the data which fully specifies the prediction of the model. Experimental results on toy examples and large real-world data sets indicate the efficiency of the approach.
